General.Name: Eden Inc Bhd
General.Description: Eden Inc. Berhad, an investment holding company, operates as an independent power producer primarily in Malaysia. The company operates through four segments: Food, Beverage, Rental and Tourism; Manufacturing; Energy; and Others. Its Food, Beverage, Rental and Tourism segment engages in the operation of restaurants and aquarium, as well as provision of catering services. The company's Manufacturing segment manufactures and sells electrical and engineering parts. Its Energy segment develops, operates, and maintains thermal and hydroelectric power plants. The company's Other segment engages in the provision of management services. It also engages in the operation management of retail commercial spaces and car park; and supplies and installs LED lighting products. The company was formerly known as Eden Enterprises (M) Berhad. Eden Inc. Berhad was founded in 1964 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
